document.full_text: a texas jury on friday acquitted an 83-year-old anti-castro cuban exile and former cia operative, considered an archfoe by havana, of charges he lied to u.s. authorities about his role in bomb attacks against tourist areas in cuba in 1997.
document.title: anti-castro cuban exile cleared of lying over bombs
lines_and_colors: a texas jury on friday acquitted an 83-year-old anti-castro cuban exile and former cia operative, considered an archfoe by havana, of charges he lied to u.s. authorities about his role in bomb attacks against tourist areas in cuba in 1997.
